Title: Do the right thing - The Simple TodoManager
Description: A simple Todo Manager which lets you focus on your daily most important tasks/todos. So do the right thing.....at your home, in your office, in your holidays, during your diet, in preparation of your next exam, etc. The Simple Todo Manager is built with VB.NET and C# based on WPF
